Resources
----------

Data
- Google Mobility Data: https://github.com/ActiveConclusion/COVID19_mobility/blob/master/summary_reports/summary_report_countries.csv
- Our World in Data Covid-19: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/owid/covid-19-data/master/public/data/owid-covid-data.csv
- Covid Measures in Europe: https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en/publications-data/download-data-response-measures-covid-19


D3 Help
- Legends in D3: https://d3-legend.susielu.com/
- Manipulating data: https://www.d3-graph-gallery.com/graph/basic_datamanipulation.html#filtering
- Color scales: https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic

Implementations
- Linear Calendar: https://bl.ocks.org/Saigesp/a0b505c3d0e42cfbdf39b0d2c19ada0c
- Calendar Heatmap: https://bl.ocks.org/Saigesp/0b0995536ec3e691cec6725783870a70
- Barchart: http://bl.ocks.org/Saigesp/f906ae2bab36f03a59c78e8d669aa68c
